text: A husband is a married man. "Married" means that the law says two people are legally "joined". During the wedding ceremony, the husband is called the groom (or bridegroom). In Christianity and Judaism a husband can have one wife (monogamy). In Islam a husband can have up to four wives (polygamy). ==Related pages== * Marriage * Wife *Sacrament * Illegitimacy * Divorce Category:Family Category:Marriage
